activities: SalesHood hosts the SalesHood Service and Mobile Applications (together, the “Covered Services”), which it provides to customers pursuant to SalesHood’s subscription services agreement. In connection with the Covered Services, SalesHood processes customers’ business data, which may include personal information, received from registered customers through password-protected Covered Services that require customers to log in. SalesHood also receives personal information about employees, service providers, and actual and prospective customers, suppliers, and business partners. Data from Covered Services: For registered customers of the Covered Services, SalesHood processes any data that the customer enters into the Covered Services (“Hosted Business Data”). SalesHood processes and stores Hosted Business Data at the customer’s initiative, direction and control. Hosted Business Data is transferred to data centers located in the USA for processing and storage. Data about Customers, Suppliers, and Partners: SalesHood collects, transfers, and uses personal information about its actual and prospective customers, suppliers, and partners for sales, billing, and marketing purposes as permissible under applicable law. As part of SalesHood’s internal operations, SalesHood transfers such information to data centers in the USA for processing and storage. Data about Employees and Service Providers: SalesHood receives and processes a number of different categories of information about employees of SalesHood and its affiliates, which may include name, job title, birthdate, gender, marital status, employee identification number, workplace contact information, reporting line, education/qualification, credentials, work history, professional achievements and awards, salary, stock option information, compensation history, performance/work history, and information regarding an employee’s spouse, family members or other dependents and beneficiaries for emergency contact and benefits administration purposes. As part of SalesHood’s internal operations, SalesHood transfers personal information about its employees and service providers to SalesHood’s USA headquarters for processing and storage.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online, off-line, and human resources data
recoursemech: Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor
